alert.note: Alert for Callahan; Jones; Shackelford; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 6:55PM CDT until May 12 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Callahan County in west central Texas... Southern Jones County in west central Texas... Southern Shackelford County in west central Texas... Taylor County in west central Texas... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 655 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Tye, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Wylie around 705 PM CDT. Potosi around 715 PM CDT. Hamby around 720 PM CDT. Clyde around 725 PM CDT. Baird around 735 PM CDT. Moran and Putnam around 755 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Funston, Impact, The Intersection Of Us- 180 And Ranch Road 126, Mccarty Lake, Lake Fort Phantom Hill, Us- 283 Near The Callahan-Shackelford County Line, I- 20 Near The Callahan- Eastland County Line, Hodges, Admiral and Camp Butman. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 261 and 323. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
